description:
Palmolive Foaming Hand Wash Vanilla & Berry is made with skin-loving ingredients, for healthy, beautiful hands. Removes germs and contains 0% parabens, phthalates & alcohol.

Made with skin loving ingredients for healthy, beautiful hands.

With natural botanical extracts, Palmolive Foaming Hand Wash Soap Vanilla & Wild Berry will gently cleanse & remove germs while leaving your hands feeling soft and smooth.

A burst of berry sweetness with warm vanilla notes to make you smile.Â 

95% Natural Origin.

What we leave out is as important as what we put in.

- No Parabens.
- No Phthalates.
- No Mineral Oil.
- No Alcohol.
- No Silicones.
- No Soap.
- No Gluten.
- No BPA.
- No Animal Derived Ingredients.
- With 100% natural essential oils.

Dermatologically tested and pH balanced.

Please recycle us! This bottle is recyclable.

Pack Size: 250mL pump
Refill your pump and save with Palmolive Foaming Hand Wash Refills

Use in the bathroom, kitchen and laundry.

FOAMING HAND WASH SOAP WITH NATURAL EXTRACTS: Palmolive Foaming Hand Wash Soap Vanilla & Berry is made with 100% natural botanical extracts.

BERRY SCENT: A burst of berry sweetness with warm vanilla notes to make you smile.

FREE FROM: Contains no Parabens, Phthalates, Mineral Oil, Alcohol, Silicones, Soap, Gluten, BPA, and Animal Derived Ingredients

REFILL AND SAVE: you can refill and save with Palmolive Foaming Hand Wash refills

RECYCLABLE BOTTLE: Palmolive Foaming Hand Wash Soap pumps are made with a recyclable bottle
name: Palmolive Foaming Liquid Hand Wash Soap Pump Vanilla & Berry 250mL
